summary:
Hi, my name is VecTor and this is my firts Mod on Skyrim. I try no make a Flying Island.For now you have just your house but in the nest update I will add some new place.Comment if you like it.And if you know how to make a better floating land PM me thank. 

-Enjoy
descriptionHtml:
[center][URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/256/skyworldlogo.png/][IMG]http://img256.imageshack.us/img256/8164/skyworldlogo.png[/IMG][/URL][/center]

[center][b]Francais en bas.[/b]

¤Annonce¤
If you know how to make good navigation mesh or you know a guy is good in that contact me please.

[u]History of update[/u]

[u]0.1[/u]
Testing creation kit, land, teleport, etc.

[u]0.2.3[/u]
New land with a blacksmith\"not finish\" but you can buy some item.New player house.adding a market place\"not finish in work\"

[u]0.2.7[/u]
Adding a Blacksmith, adding 2 NPC in the Market.Adding a Inn\"not finish\", adding floaing island.Adding a continant\"use the door or jumps down of the sky world\", adding house on continant.

[u]Future plans[/u]
Adding little floating island, adding quest, adding NPC, armor.

[u]Requirement:[/u]

The [url=\"http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/modmanager/\"]Nexus Mod Manager[/url] (NMM) is RECOMMENDED for properly installing Sky World
The [url=\"http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/12308\"]Sexy Solitude 1.0[/url] Mod I work whit it for make this mod. (optional)

[u]Introduction:[/u]

I start to work on this mod because I see the new Zelda Skyward Sword and I was inspired by floating islands. this is why I show you today my 0.1 Version of Sky World.
[u]
Installation:
[/u]
Click the Download with manager button on top of the file.
Sky World will appear in in NMM\'s Mods list once it\'s downloaded. Double-click the Sky World entry to Activate it.
Done!

[u]Crediting:[/u]
If you want to use my mod for whatever you want you will first have to ask me the permission and explain me what you want to do with it. All I ask you in return is that you give me credits.

----------------------------------------------Francais------------------------------------------------------------
¤Annonce¤
Si vous conaisser une persoone qui c\'est faire des bonne navigation mesh ou meme vous contacter moi S.V.P.

[u]Requière:
[/u]
Le [url=\"http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/modmanager/\"]Nexus Mod Manager[/url] (NMM) est recommandé pour installer Sky World proprement
Le [url=\"http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/12308\"]Sexy Solitude 1.0[/url] j\'ai travaillé avec ce mod la alors ce n’est pas obliger mais ces plus beau.



[u]Introduction:[/u]

J\'ai commencé a travailler sur ce mod parce que le nouveau Zelda Skyward Sword ma inspirer par les îles qui flotte partout dans le jeu .aujourd\'hui je vous propose ma version 0.1 de Sky World.

[u]Installation:[/u]


Cliquer sur download with manager
Sky World doit apparaitre dan la liste de mod dans le NMM.
Double clic sur le Sky World et activer le.
Fini! 


[u]Credit[/u]
Si vous voulez utiliser mon mod pour quoi que ce soit vous devrez me demander la permission et expliquer moi ce que vous voulait faire avec. Je vous demande juste de me créditer.[/center]
author: F7 VecTor
